strings.description: A grown-up mini smart pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to MAG within their pot. It carries around a wonderful cane, and is obsessed with increasing its own MAG. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. Though incredibly wise, looking down on the ignorant, it is very timid, and will hide in its pot if scared.
strings.summon: There is none more intellegent than me. I feel sorry for my foolish enemies.
